name: Lonnie SPELLMAN, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Spellman v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Lonnie SPELLMAN, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of March, 2012, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED, without prejudice to appellant’s ability to file a request to the Commonwealth Court to appeal nunc pro tunc.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
40 A.3d 1230
Lonnie SPELLMAN, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 26, 2012.
